summary: An Ordinance authorizing the discontinuance of street railway operation on that portion of Route No. 1 of Ordinance No. 480 of the former City of Ballard, beginning at the intersection of Twentieth Avenue Northwest and Ballard Avenue, running thence southeasterly along Ballard Avenue to the intersection on of Seventeenth Avenue Northwest and West Forty-seventh Street, thence easterly along West Forty-seventh Street to Fourteenth Avenue Northwest.
